content.rendered:
Directed by Julian Holmes. Alex Kalymnios. Doug Liman. Emmanuel Osei-Kuffour.

Written by George V. Ghanem. George V. Ghanem. Alexi Hawley. Alexi Hawley. Hadi Nicholas Deeb. Maya Goldsmith. Niceole R. Levy. Amelia Roper.

Cast  Fivel Stewart( Hannah Copeland ) . Laura Haddock( Max Meladze ) . Aarti Mann( Violet Ebner ) . Colton Dunn( Lester Kitchens ) . Vondie Curtis-Hall( Walter Nyland ) . Daniel Quincy Annoh( Terence ) . Kaylah Zander( Amelia ) . Kristian Bruun( Janus Ferber ) . Angel Parker( Dawn Gilbane ) . Jesse Collin( Dodge ) . Jake Lewis( Phantom ) . Byron Mann( Xander ) . Pauline Little( Nyland’s Secretary ) . Victor Andres Turgeon-Trelles( Talco ) . David Denman( Kevin Mills ) . Alexandra Petrachuk( Kelly Kwitny ) . Katharine King So( Sarah Okongo ) . Christian Jadah( Dave Standish ) . Gabriel Infante( The Other Jorge ) . Nico DeCastris( Jeff Gilbert ) . Linus Roache( Senator Smoot ) . Amanda Schull( Cora ) . Maddie Hasson( Marta ) . Travis Nelson( Linus ) . Jean Marchand( Attorney General ) . Kira Clavell( Mei Copeland ) . Ellis Arch( Tim Maeson ) . Andy Assaf( Ahmed ) . Sean Tucker( Larry ) . Jeroen Engelsman( Barnim ) . Zeshaun Saleem( Arjun ) . Yung Ngo( Honghui ) . Amanda Ip( Bricks ) . Stephanie Costa( Mo ) . Salka Weber( Shira ) . Arturo Castro( Sandoval Luna ) . Daniel Chae Jun( Grant ) . Sabryn Rock( A’Nyah Bell ) . Jamaal Grant( Liam ) . Gregory Hlady( Lev Orlov ) . Jayce Barreiro( Sheriff Matt Ramirez ) . Vitali Makarov( General Kuznetsov ) . Sean Hoy( Salvatore Kwitny ) . Josh Blacker( Bank Manager ) . Tristan D. Lalla( Officer Darren Weathers ) . Jon Snow( Dr. Andre Morris ) . Charlie Saxton( Danny Woodrow ) . Kathryn Kirkpatrick( Professor ) . Matt Holland( Dr. Hirsch ) . Curtis Legault( Librarian ) . Daniel Chichagov( Peytr ) . Nathan Fillion( CIA Director ) . Michael Lazarovitch( Dustin Hatch ) . Leisa Reid( Senator Smoot’s Secretary ) . Karrie Kwong( Soo ) . Andre Roshkov( Kirill ) . Kate MacLellan( Savannah ) . Mladen Obradovic( Pavel ) . Deena Aziz( Judge Chaves ) . Jason Medwin( SAC Officer ) . Maria Herrera( Nurse ) . Samantha Fins( Ratchy ) . Bobbie Lamour( Female Guard ) . Charlie Ebbs( Ben Leech ) . Daniela Akerblom( Clerk ) . Max Laferriere( Edik ) . Antony Pellerin( The Beard ) . Mimi CÃ´tÃ©( Yadira ) . Trevor Hayes( Neil Copeland ) . Martin Blais( Concierge ) . Ivan Hutomo( Henry Finch ) . Caroline Gauthier( Patisserie Owner ) . Anana Rydvald( Assistant ) . Don Anderson( Ambassador Lance Keegan ) . Sebastien Beaulac( Police Officer ) . Viviana Imara( Flight Attendant ) . Benjamin/ep Holmann Jean( Nyland Child #1 ) . Myles Stuart( Barman ) . MÃ©linda Azor( Nyland Child #3 ) . Liliane Zillner( Myka ) . Ahmed Mawas( Farid ) . MichmahÃ«ll Aubourg ClergÃ©( Nyland Child #4 ) . Joshua Bilbao( Nate ) . Tom Hanslmaier( Zaddy ) . Alex Rykov( Max’s Husband ) . Christian Geisberg( Fredrick ) . Jon Ambrose( The Beast ) . Michael Duregger( Waiter ) . Willi Neuner( Delivery Man ) . Adrian Stowasser( German Male Driver )

Language English.

Producers Noah Centineo. Maya Goldsmith. Alexi Hawley. Niceole R. Levy. Agatha Warren. Marc David Alpert. David Bartis. Adam Ciralsky. Hadi Nicholas Deeb. Charlie Ebersol. Gene Klein. Doug Liman. Irene Litinsky. Aren Prupas. Amelia Roper. Sean Ryerson.

Production Entertainment One. Hypnotic.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2022–)
